name: Doublefields
description:
Thank YOU for visiting Doublefields!

Battle it out in Doublefields with upcoming game modes such as:

-Battle Royale
-Field Extermination
-Team Deathmatch

Battle Royale

Battle Royale is from popular games such as Fortnite, PUBG, H1Z1 and more. We have our own twist to the mode. But you will have to find out what it is ;)

Field Extermination

Field Extermination is our own mode! In FE, the game auto-selects a crew and if you are in the crew of 10, 10 others are plants and have to hide around the map. The hunters are given spray and have to find the fake plants. Each time a plant gets sprayed, it takes 25% health away and then it teleports away and goes to hide again! After all the plants are killed in the time limit of 10 mins, the match ends.

Team Deathmach

In a lobby of 20, the teams are split (10 on each team) and the teams have to battle until 1 team gets to the score limit. The top 3 get more XP than the others!

Notice

This game is not fully done, work is needed and so is staff. Join our discord for announcments and maybe to get a job with us!

https://discord.gg/nUj9gZe

Support

Do we have a support email? Well yes, here it is: krispgames01@gmail.com

Copying

Unauthorised copying of this game will result in us trying to remove it, possibly the ItchIO Staff will get involved.
